title: Why people rage?!
body:
Want to know why people rage in this game?

Your top lane takes smite then steals your blue in the opening minutes of one game and  the very next game the support goes AFK for 12 minutes and my team is blaming me as the jungler for not helping enough.

How are you supposed to stay cool and not rage when people just deliberately waste your time?!

gets banned because fed up with rage-quitter and trolling jungle so says will afk

ok

play another game with an intentional troll, both bot laners quit, can't FF because you need 3 minimum votes or unanymous to surrender at 3 or less

hostage in  2v6, can't afk, can't win because enemy team too fed but not smart enough to end, can't quit because intentional feeder and troll who's angry at Riot for some reason won't FF

15 minutes later enemy team ends

ok

This is why people rage. We're forced to endure bullshit after bullshit after bullshit without letting out the stress, which is _SCIENTIFICALLY HARMFUL TO YOUR HEALTH_ mind you. 

Welcome to league of legends.

Problem being, venting to people unrelated to your issues scientifically does not remove stress, simply pushes it down in your mental box.

See, here’s the thing: **That’s not against any rule**.

Nobody owns buffs. Nobody owns jungle camps. Nobody owns lane minions, nor neutral monsters. Thus, it’s not against any rule for people to take them from you. Yeah, it sucks.

Getting mad at people for not breaking any rules? That’s nobody’s fault but the person “raging”.
